title: League Will Not Start After Pressing Launch
body:
Hey everyone, I'm having a problem starting my game. Worked fine just last night and today suddenly wont work.

Problem: I start client, it appears, I press "Launch" and it makes the sound, then shows a loading icon for maybe 3 seconds then nothing.

Things ive tried: Deleting the RAD files
Repairing the game
Running as Administrator
Fully uninstalling the game from my pc and reinstalling
Turning off firewall
Turning off all virus protection
etc...etc....

I notice that if I attempt to run the game twice in a row, I get "PVP.Net patcher kernel has stopped working. Which according to online forums the RAD file delete should work, which it did not.

After I attempt to start the game and it fails, my task manager still shows LolClient(32 bit) and LoL Patcher (32 bit), but both are running at little to no memory so they are basically inactive. If anyone can give me a solution that would be appreciated. I expected a fresh reinstallation of the game would fix it, but apparently it does not. Thanks

replies.body:
It really sounds like your client is having a hard time reaching the login servers. This often happens due to network settings that conflict with League, so I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as the next step in troubleshooting.

Let me know if these steps resolve the issue,
